AddFunction.description:
DHTML [Client] Defines a Javascript function that when called will call a Lua callback.

[string] library
  Library name of the JS function you are defining.

[string] name
  Name of the JS function you are defining.

[function] callback
  Function called when the JS function is called. Arguments passed to the JS function will be passed here.

Call.description:
DHTML [Client] Runs/Executes a string as JavaScript code.

[string] js
  Specify JavaScript code to be executed.

ConsoleMessage.description:
DHTML [Client] 

[string] msg
  The message to be logged (or Lua code to be executed; see above).

QueueJavascript.description:
DHTML [Client] Runs/Executes a string as JavaScript code.

[string] js
  Specify JavaScript code to be executed.

SetAllowLua.description:
DHTML [Client] 

[boolean] allow=false
  Whether or not to allow Lua.

SetScrollbars.description:
DHTML [Client] 

[boolean] show
  True if scrollbars should be visible.
